context: Retail company facing supply chain disruptions from global events needs to enhance resilience and reduce dependency on single suppliers

request.purpose: Supply chain diversification and digital transformation
request.justification: Recent disruptions caused 15% sales loss, single supplier dependency creating vulnerability

decision_process.outcome: Identified critical vulnerabilities in overseas sourcing and transportation
Multi-supplier strategy with digital supply chain platform

business_impact.expected_outcome: Reduced supply disruption risk by 60%, improved inventory turnover, enhanced supplier relationships

lessons_learned: Proactive risk assessment revealed hidden vulnerabilities, diversified sourcing strategy balanced cost and resilience
